candidate Profile Description.summary: Data Scientist/ML Engineer with a comprehensive academic background in machine learning and computer vision, specializing in time-series and predictive modeling. Proficient in SQL, PowerBI, and Google Cloud Platform. Seeking opportunities in AI/ML and Data Science while advancing German language skills for professional communication. Strong foundation in Scrum, Kanban, Jira, and SDLC, with hands-on experience implementing Agile for tangible business benefits. Eager to learn more about Cloud technologies.

education.degree: Masters in Information and Communication Systems
Bachelors of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering

experience.title: Master Thesis
experience.project: 3D Human Pose Estimation and Activity Recognition in Omnidirectional Images
achievements: Estimation of 3D pose from 2D joints in Omnidirectional Images.
Conducted 2D and 3D action recognition in top view images.
Refined the 3D action accuracy by 3.67% in the top-view images.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.project: Human Pose Estimation in Omnidirectional Images using MMPose
achievements: Implemented a Deep Learning pipeline with MMPose for Human Pose Estimation.
Refined the accuracy from the initial 70.6% to 73.2% in Top View Images.
Annotated Data for Top View (Omnidirectional Images) dataset using CVAT.

experience.title: Oracle APEX Database Developer Intern
achievements: Implemented the Web-based Administration         Application (User and Role Management, Statistics, Dashboard) for Network Database based on Oracle APEX.
Implemented the web page to maintain Catalog information in the network database.
Developed a Prototype for a Mobile App for collecting network data.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer I
achievements: Contributed to data processing software and print solutions for clients primarily in the telecommunication and utilities industries.
Performed code conversion of applications from Legacy clients VB6 to VB.net.
Contributed to coding, code reviews, implementation, training, and documentation.

experience.title: Associate Consultant
achievements: Part of an agile team developing Windows and web applications for Royal Bank of Canada client.
Participated in SCR and PCR processes, analyzing customer requirements and developing code to ensure customer satisfaction.
Ensured effective design, development, validation and support for client requests on a timely basis.
